title: My Xbox one is not ejecting the disc inside. How can I fix this? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can try and remove the power from the brick, plug it back in and see if this lets the disc eject. If not, then you’ll want to remove the xboxone from your entertainment center, take it to a table. Plug it in, Slide an ID card inside the slot to make sure something isn’t blocking it. Retry. Still no luck? Do you hear the motor trying to eject the disc? If you still hear it then try to pick the unit up, slow facing down and try to eject. Maybe a little shake too. If still no joy, then you’ll have to return the unit for service. Somehow the disc got severely jammed. Trying to remove it yourself might void your warranty and you might even do more damage than good, scratch the disc/etc. Hope this helps.
I manually ejected the disc and it worked for me! How To Manually EJECT a DISC from your Xbox One console. STUCK DISC FAULT
